article_id: The unique numeric identifier for the product
detail_desc: Detailed description of the product (free text)
product_group_name: High-level category of the product (e.g. sweater)
product_type_name: Subcategory of the product (e.g. garment upper body)
perceived_colour_value_name: Tone of the color (e.g. light, medium, dark)
perceived_colour_master_name: Basic hue family (e.g. red, blue, green, etc.)
index_group_name: High-level H&M brand of the product (e.g. Divided, H&M+, etc.)
index_name: If available, detailed H&M brand of the product
